content.prompt_es: Selecciona la traducción para 'Ir a casa':

content.stimulus_en: She usually has a quick shower in the morning.
They go often for a long walk in the evening.
He never eats breakfast before work.
I wake always up at 6 o'clock.
I sometimes listen to podcasts while I cook.
What do time you usually finish your homework?
